overview: Imagine you have a mom with BPD (Borderline Personality Disorder) and you get struggles with her because she's toxic with you and jealous on every girl of your school. At the end she even get your balls...  You will see the entire story of how Erica will get pregnant by raping, how she put on weight and get birth to her son and so her toxic behavior and relationship with him... timmy hates her but will start to love this journey very soon!
title: Borderline Mom
